description: You enter an abandoned part of the Roost. There might be something useful lying here among the straw. What do you do?
name: An abandoned, old chicken coop

description: You enter an abandoned part of the Roost. You wonder if there could be any gold or weapons here. What do you do?
name: An empty part of the Roost

description: You enter the Chicken King's chambers, but it seems the King is not here. You could try snooping around.
name: The Chicken King's chambers

description: You discover a Chicken Blacksmith, selling his wares. The bird eyes you suspiciously...
name: Chicken Blacksmith

description: You suddenly discover a treasure chest, hidden away among the straw.
name: Treasure Chest

description: You turn the corner into a long dark corridor. It's chilly here, and you can hear the wind howling outside.
name: A dark corridor

description: You enter a large hall. You can hear a fowl noise coming from the end of the hallway.
name: A large hall

description: You find yourself at the end of a long hallway. Where will you go from here?
name: The end of a hallway

description: You walk into a long hall. You can hear the wind howling outside.
name: A long hall

description: You've found the chicken nursery. There are chicks everywhere!
name: Fowl nursery

description: You enter an abandoned part of the Roost. You wonder if there could be any gold or weapons here. What do you do?
name: An empty part of the Roost

description: You stumble upon a decrepit old room. There's a fowl smell coming from the corner.
name: A decrepit old room

description: You enter an eerie room in the Roost. You wonder if there could be any gold or weapons here. What do you do?
name: An eery room

description: You find a room full of chickens. They seem to be having a meeting. What will you do?
name: A room full of chickens

description: You've discovered the Chicken temple. You can hear the sound of chanting coming from somewhere..
name: The Chicken Temple

description: You've found another room in the Chicken Temple. The chanting sounds louder here.
name: The Chicken Temple

description: You've discovered the Chicken Crypt. It smells horrible, and it feels as if you're being watched. What do you do?
name: The Chicken Crypt
